title: Kimi ni Somaru Machi no Iro
sinopse:
The model student Yoshiyuki and the overt Chiba have been friends since childhood. However, Yoshiyuki feels more for his beloved classmate, but he doesn't intend to reveal his feelings to him. Only when it's clear that their paths will part after graduating from high school he starts to have doubts...

(Source: MU)
